name: soundnet
overview:
Soundnet is a provider of music and video content to over 15,000 public venues, from pubs and clubs to cafÃ©s and department stores.

Since its creation in 2000, Soundnet has built a solid reputation as one of Europeâ€™s leading suppliers of audio and visual content to bars, clubs and other venues, specialising in bespoke music and video compilations that capture a brand’s unique personality.

Soundnet has developed a number of products and partnerships that deliver complementary services, maximising sales and commercial opportunities whilst adding to customer experience. These include Soundnet Wi-Fi, Background Music software, PayPlay Music packages for digital jukeboxes, and Smart Quiz applications.
